page.title: 17MYSTERIES AND SUPERSTITIONS
page.content:
The road through{Ince Woods}is an accident "black spot". Local superstition blames some of these on {"the Grey Lady",}a mysterious ghostly figure who is said to wander down Cross Barn Lane onto the main road.
During our research we heard of a mysterious tunnel, starting at{Ince {Blundell Hall}and crossing the parkland to Tower Wood, where there was once a sort of tower.Some local people know of the existence of this tunnel, but no-one knew its purpose.
The organ in{Ince Blundell church } is supposed to play every Christmas Eve before Midnight Mass, but we couldn't find anyone who had heard it.
